bill.summary: 3/23/1994--Introduced. Amends the Consolidated Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1985 to prohibit the charging of customs user fees in connection with the arrival of passengers aboard aircraft that carry no more than 11 passengers, if: (1) the aircraft provides transportation only between places that are no more than 50 miles apart; (2) it is in competition with a ferry; and (3) the transportation fee is less than $35.
